Article Title: Telangana CM Revanth Reddy order probe against HCA office bearers harassment against SRH for free passes
Article Text:
Telangana CM A Revanth Reddy ordered an investigation into allegations against Hyderabad Cricket Association officials harassing Sunrisers Hyderabad with demands for free tickets. SRH management threatened to relocate if such practices continue. IPS officer K Sreenivasa Reddy will conduct the inquiry. A recent incident involved HCA representatives locking a box on SRH's match day until extra tickets were provided.

HYDERABAD: Following media reports about the Hyderabad Cricket Association (HCA) president and some other top officials harassing and blackmailing the IPL franchise Sunrisers Hyderabad over free tickets, Telangana chief minister A Revanth Reddy, on Monday, ordered an investigation into the matter.The state government appointed senior IPS officer Kothakota Sreenivasa Reddy , currently serving as director general (vigilance & enforcement) to conduct an investigation in the case and submit a report soon.Recently, the SRH management took strong objection to HCA president A Jagan Mohan Rao‚Äôs conduct and shot an email, threatening to stop playing matches in Hyderabad‚Äôs Rajiv Gandhi International Cricket stadium if they continue to harass them with demands for free tickets.‚ÄúAll these unprofessional threats and actions by HCA, especially by the HCA president, make it evident that you don‚Äôt want Sunrisers to play at your stadium. If that is the case, please let me know in writing so that we can inform the BCCI, the Telangana govt, and our management that you wish for us to move to another venue, and we will move,‚Äù Sunrisers‚Äô general manager Srinath TB told HCA in an email.Reacting to this development, the state government took cognizance and ordered an enquiry to end the culture of franchises demanding free tickets."The chief minister has appointed Sreenivasa Reddy to enquiry into the allegations. He has also issued instructions to esnure that no one harasses the SRH management for passes no matter who they are. It could be officers in uniform or anyone else for that matter, this practice should end,‚Äô‚Äô a source in the secretariat told TOI.What triggered the row was HCA representatives locking up a box on the day of the SRH-LSG match on Thursday. ‚ÄúPlease note that we pay the appropriate rent for the stadium, and during the tenure of the IPL, the stadium is under our jurisdiction. But in the last game, you locked the F3 box, refusing to open it unless 20 extra free tickets were given to you. This unprofessional behaviour creates a hostile environment, making cooperation increasingly difficult,‚Äù he stated.
Article Summary: Telangana cm a revanth reddy ordered an investigation into allegations against hyderabad cricket association officials harassing sunrisers hyderabad with demands for free tickets. A recent incident involved hca representatives locking a box on srh's match day until extra tickets were provided.

Article Title: Will Juan Soto play tonight against the Miami Marlins? Latest update on New York Mets star's injury report (31 March 2025)
Article Text:
Will Juan Soto play tonight against the Miami Marlins? Latest update on New York Mets star's injury report (31 March, 2025) (Image Source: Getty)

Juan Soto‚Äôs injury report: Will the New York Mets‚Äô star face the Miami Marlins tonight?

Injury report of the Miami Marlins

It will be the New York Mets vs the Miami Marlins tonight at the LoanDepot Park in Florida at 06:40 p.m. ET. It was a fabulous season for the New York Mets as they ranked 6th in the series for hitting 207 homers in the last season in the year 2024. By scoring some extra base hits in the MLB season, the New York Mets secured the 9th position in the series.As it was a happening season for the New York Mets, it was very unlikely for the Miami Marlins as the team managed to secure 24th position in the MLB season last year. The match between the New York Mets and the Miami Marlins will be streaming on Fubo. On the other hand, the viewers can also follow the match on FDSFL and SNY channels on their televisions.In the previous season, it was a force start for the New York Mets as Juan Soto was unstoppable. However, there are no injury updates from the team regarding Juan Soto means that Juan Soto is fit for the New York Mets tonight against the Miami Marlins. There are going to be some changes for the New York Mets as some players are placed on the injured list by the team. The team placed Jared Young on the 7-day injured list; however, the reason has not been disclosed yet by the team.Rafeal Ortega and Yacksel Rios will be playing for the minor baseball leagues, as decided by the team members. Further, Drew Gilbert (hamstring) has been placed by the New York Mets for a 7-day injured list revealed on Thursday. The New York Mets also put Ronny Mauricio and Paul Blackburn for their knee injury on the 10-day and 15-day injured lists, respectively. There are going to be some changes in the strategy of the team as some players are placed for their injuries.The team is now looking forward to having another successful match against the Miami Marlins, with Juan Soto being one of the dominating players along with other teammates tonight.For the Miami Marlins, few of the players are going to play the match against the New York Mets with no injury, while some will face the game with minor injuries. Ryan Weathers (left forearm strain) will be starting the season for the Miami Marlins on the injured list. Further, Declan Cronin (left hip strain) has been placed by the team on the 15-day injured list, and Connor Norby (left oblique strain) has been placed by the Miami Marlins on 10-day injured list. Jesus Sanchez (side) is also going to begin the season against the New York Mets on the injured list.Also Read: Aaron Judge claims 'nobody can replace' Mets Juan Soto following Yankees 20-9 win vs Milwaukee
Article Summary: The new york mets and the miami marlins will play tonight at the loandepot park in florida at 06:40 p.m. Et. There are no injury updates from the team regarding juan soto. Some players are going to be placed on the injured list by the team. The match will be streaming on fubo.

Article Title: Carmelo Anthony and La La Anthony are always ready to support their son Kiyan, this time for "The Throne"
Article Text:
La La Anthony with her ex-husband (Image via Shareif Ziyadat/Getty)

Kiyan Anthony was the star of the Crusaders vs. Bears game



Carmelo Anthony and La La Anthony attend The Throne semifinals

Kiyan Anthony , son of Carmelo and La La Anthony , was the star player for Lutheran High School in The Throne basketball tournament . The event, sponsored by the NBA Players Association and Gold Level Sports and Entertainment, saw eight teams competing for the top spot in the league, and the Crusaders seem to be at the top of their game, with Kiyan leading the charge. And Melo and La La were there as always to cheer for their son.The semifinal game in The Throne tournament was between the Lutheran High School Crusaders and the William J. Brennan Bears. As part of The Throne Hoops National Championships, fans were there to watch the game in hoards in East Rutherford, New Jersey. And along with them, Kiyan Anthony's parents - Carmelo and La La were also there to hype their son as he led the Crusaders to a win against the Bears. The former couple have been very straight about the fact that parenting always comes before anything else.The scorecard at the end of the final buzzer read 83-56 in favor of the Crusaders. The young Anthony scored 17 points, 1 assist, and 1 rebound. The Crusaders beat Highland (VA) 56-55 in the elimination round, before coming face to face with the Bears. And now, after they beat the Bears, are getting ready to go up against the Eagles later tonight on March 29.Both Carmelo and La La Anthony are very supportive parents and rarely miss any important event in their only son's life. Kiyan, who has chosen to join the Syracuse University men's basketball team and is considered to be the best celebrity kid player in the field, will be following in his father's footsteps after finishing high school.And through all of it, both Melo and La La have been cheering for their son as he goes from one career milestone to another. The ex couple were sitting together courtside, as Kiyan gave a phenomenal performance inside of it.Read Also: Carmelo Anthony is dreaming big; wants to buy a $4.1 billion NBA franchise
Article Summary: Kiyan anthony, son of carmelo and la la anthony, was the star player for lutheran high school in the throne basketball tournament. The crusaders beat the william j. brennan bears 83-56 in the semifinal game. Kiyan scored 17 points, 1 assist, and 1 rebound.

Article Title: Philadelphia Flyers begin extensive search for new head coach following John Tortorella's departure
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Flyers‚Äô top candidates for head coach

With John Tortorella no longer at the helm of the Philadelphia Flyers, the team is in search of a new head coach to lead them forward. While Brad Shaw has been appointed as the interim coach for the remainder of the season, the organization will likely conduct an extensive search for a permanent replacement. Several candidates have emerged as potential fits for the role, each bringing unique strengths to the table.The Flyers are searching for a new head coach, with candidates including David Carle, Rick Tocchet, Mike Sullivan, Jay Woodcroft, and Marc Savard. GM Daniel Bri√®re must choose between experience and fresh leadership.One strong contender is David Carle, the head coach of the University of Denver. At just 35 years old, Carle has already achieved remarkable success, leading his team to NCAA championships in 2022 and 2024. He also coached Team USA to back-to-back gold medals in the World Junior Championships in 2024 and 2025. His ability to develop young players makes him an appealing option for the Flyers, who are in a rebuilding phase. Additionally, his brother, Matt Carle, played for the Flyers, giving him a personal connection to the organization.Another option is Rick Tocchet, a Flyers legend who played 621 games for the team and later transitioned into coaching. Currently leading the Vancouver Canucks, Tocchet has previous experience as head coach of the Tampa Bay Lightning and Arizona Coyotes. Reports suggest that Vancouver wants to extend his contract, but his deep ties to Philadelphia and coaching style could make him a strong candidate if he becomes available.A more experienced candidate is Mike Sullivan, who led the Pittsburgh Penguins to back-to-back Stanley Cup victories in 2016 and 2017. With the Penguins potentially missing the playoffs for a third straight year, there is speculation that a coaching change could happen. If Sullivan becomes available, his championship experience and ability to manage high-pressure situations would make him a major asset for the Flyers.Another potential candidate is Jay Woodcroft, the current head coach of the Edmonton Oilers. Woodcroft has been praised for his ability to develop offensive strategies and get the best out of young players. His coaching philosophy aligns with the Flyers' long-term plans, making him a strong option if Edmonton decides to part ways with him.Lastly, Marc Savard is another name to watch. As an assistant coach with the St. Louis Blues, he has been instrumental in developing their power-play systems and offensive structure. His expertise in creating effective offensive strategies could be valuable for a Flyers team looking to improve their scoring efficiency.Also Read: Wayne Gretzky once predicted Alex Ovechkin could break his all-time NHL goal record, and it's closer than ever With general manager Daniel Bri√®re leading the coaching search, the Flyers will likely consider multiple options before making a final decision. Whether they choose a veteran coach with NHL experience or a younger coach with a fresh approach, the decision will be crucial in shaping the team's future.
Article Summary: The philadelphia flyers are searching for a new head coach. David carle, rick tocchet, mike sullivan, jay woodcroft, and marc savard are potential candidates. General manager daniel bri√®re must choose between experience and fresh leadership.

Article Title: What happened between Anthony Edwards and Kevin Durant that sent Minnesota Timberwolves star to the locker room?
Article Text:
Anthony Edwards and Kevin Durant. Image via: Abbie Parr/ AP

Anthony Edwards received a hard elbow from Kevin Durant



The Minnesota Timberwolves faced a moment of uncertainty on Friday night when star guard Anthony Edwards went down after a collision with Phoenix Suns forward Kevin Durant . Edwards had to be escorted to the locker room after taking a hit to the face during the first quarter. The Ant-Man returned to the court, but the hard blow on his nose was a serious concern for the Timberwolves and their fans at the moment.When 2:43 was left in the first quarter, Anthony Edwards attempted to intercept a pass intended for Kevin Durant, but in the process, Durant‚Äôs arm caught him across the nose. The impact sent Edwards to the ground in visible pain, where he remained for a minute before walking off with assistance. The incident initially sparked concerns about a possible serious injury, as Edwards had a towel covering his face while heading to the locker room.Dane Moore of Blue Wire described the incident, stating, ‚ÄúAnthony Edwards headed to the locker room with a towel over his face after a collision with Kevin Durant. Looked like he maybe got poked in the eye or something.‚Äù Similarly, Duane Rankin of azcentral reported, ‚ÄúAnthony Edwards went down as he and Kevin Durant were going for the ball.‚ÄùEdwards‚Äô absence in the second quarter raised alarms for Timberwolves fans, considering his exceptional season, where he has averaged 27.3 points, 5.7 rebounds, and 4.6 assists per game on 44.1% shooting. With Minnesota sitting in eighth place and just a half-game behind the Los Angeles Clippers for the final guaranteed playoff spot, every game is crucial.Despite the injury scare, Edwards returned in the second half and finished the game with 20 points, helping the Timberwolves secure a 124-109 victory over the Suns. The win marked a four-game season sweep for Minnesota over Phoenix and extended their winning streak against the Suns to seven games. Edwards is currently averaging 23.7 points per game.Also Read: Stephen Curry returns to lead Golden State Warriors to victory over New Orleans Pelican Julius Randle led the Timberwolves with 25 points, while Collin Gillespie stepped up with a career-high 22 points and nine assists. On the other side, Durant finished with 23 points for the Suns, who have now dropped two straight games after winning four in a row. Phoenix also continued to struggle without Bradley Beal, who missed his sixth consecutive game due to a left hamstring injury.
Article Summary: Minnesota timberwolves guard anthony edwards went down after a collision with phoenix suns forward kevin durant. Edwards had to be escorted to the locker room after taking a hit to the face during the first quarter. He returned in the second half and finished the game with 20 points, helping the timberwolves secure a 124-109 victory.

Article Title: ‚ÄãLos Angeles Dodgers vs. Atlanta Braves - Where and how to watch today‚Äôs match, venue, time and more
Article Text:
Shohei Ohtani via Instagram

Dodgers vs. Braves‚ÄîWhere and How to Watch Dodgers vs. Braves- Venue Dodgers vs. Braves‚ÄîTeam Strengths Los Angeles Dodgers Atlanta Braves Tigers vs. Dodgers Game Highlights (3/29/25) | MLB Highlights Dodgers vs. Braves‚ÄîGame Prediction After being in the spotlight due to their great starting lineup to defeating the Chicago Cubs during the opening day in Tokyo, the Los Angeles Dodgers have mastered the art of being in the spotlight. On March 31, 2025, the Los Angeles Dodgers would be facing the Atlanta Braves at the Dodgers‚Äô Stadium in Los Angeles, California. According to the schedule, the game between the Dodgers and the Braves would start at 10:10 pm.The game between the Los Angeles Dodgers and Atlanta Braves will be broadcast on the Spectrum SportsNet LA (FDSSO). The game can also be watched on the MLB‚Äôs official streaming partner, MLB.TV , which is subjected to regional restrictions. The game‚Äôs broadcasting would vary based on different locations.The face-off between the Los Angeles Dodgers and Atlanta Braves will take place at Dodger Stadium, which is located at 1000 Vin Scully Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90012. It is the third-oldest Major League Baseball stadium. The Dodger Stadium offers a rich history and a classic ballpark experience to the spectators.The Los Angeles Dodgers‚Äô roster lineup does not need any description, as the popular MLB team has already proved that they are one of the top contenders for the World Championship Series title. From the talented designated hitter Shohei Ohtani to slugger Freddie Freeman , the Dodgers have the best team.After roping in Japanese pitching prodigy Roki Sasaki, Tanner Scott, and Blake Snell, the Dodgers have strengthened their pitching depth and their consecutive victories during the 2025 MLB season is a testimonial to this.Atlanta Braves left fielder Marcell Ozuna is one of the most reliable contributors. He has been leading the team with respect to home runs and RBIs during the 2024 MLB season. The Braves pitching star cornerstone, Chris Sale, Ozzie Albies, and Matt Olson's presence in the team has been quite helpful.While both the major league teams are incredibly talented, the Los Angeles Dodgers have an edge over the Atlanta Braves in the upcoming game. From playing on their home ground to a deeper pitching rotation, the Dodgers‚Äô dominance over the Braves can be easily seen with respect to the statistics of both teams.
Article Summary: On march 31, 2025, the los angeles dodgers would be facing the atlanta braves at the dodgers‚Äô stadium in los angeles, california. According to the schedule, the game between the dodgers and the braves would start at 10:10 pm. The game will be broadcast on the spectrum sportsnet la (fdsso).

Article Title: Fan's medical emergency halts Oilers-Flames game, but Edmonton prevail in thrilling OT finish
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Oilers acknowledge fast action of spectators and emergency personnel



During the March 29, 2025, Edmonton Oilers game against the Calgary Flames , a medical emergency in the stands caused a moment of panic. A fan suddenly collapsed on the stairs, shocking those nearby. However, people closest to the individual immediately stepped in to help before paramedics at Rogers Place arrived to provide medical assistance.The unexpected incident took everyone by surprise, but those nearby wasted no time reacting. Spectators closest to the individual quickly stepped in to assist before paramedics at Rogers Place arrived to provide medical care. Now, nearly a day after the event, the Oilers have addressed the situation publicly.In their post addressing ‚Äúthe medical emergency during last night‚Äôs,‚Äù game, the Edmonton Oilers initial reaction was to express gratitude to the community. ‚ÄúThe Edmonton Oilers & OEGSE are grateful to the emergency services personnel, our OEGSE staff & the fans who assisted in attending to this emergency,‚Äù the NHL team wrote in their statement.The Oilers took a moment to recognize the strong sense of unity within the hockey community, acknowledging the collective effort that played a vital role in handling the situation. Their statement reinforced the importance of teamwork‚Äînot just on the ice, but also in moments of real-life emergencies, where quick thinking and cooperation can make all the difference.Despite the sudden medical emergency, the game eventually resumed after the fan received proper medical attention. The Edmonton Oilers and Calgary Flames continued their intense Battle of Alberta matchup, with both teams fighting hard in a crucial game, especially for the Flames, who were clinging to their playoff hopes.The game remained tightly contested, with both teams exchanging goals and pushing the match into overtime. In the extra period, Leon Draisaitl became the hero for the Oilers, scoring his 51st goal of the season to secure a 3-2 victory. The win was significant for Edmonton as they continued their strong push toward the playoffs.Also Read:The incident in the stands, however, served as a sobering reminder of the importance of having well-trained emergency personnel at major events. It also highlighted the strong sense of unity within the hockey community, as fans, staff, and medical teams came together in a moment of crisis to ensure the safety and well-being of one of their own.
Article Summary: A fan suddenly collapsed on the stairs during a game between the edmonton oilers and the calgary flames. Spectators closest to the individual quickly stepped in to assist before paramedics arrived to provide medical care. Now, nearly a day after the event, the oilers have addressed the situation publicly.

Article Title: "It was a challenge to give grace": Dwayne Wade's wife Gabrielle Union shares heartfelt story about supporting him through his health struggles
Article Text:
Image via Johnny Nunez/Getty

Dwayne Wade‚Äôs wife, Gabrielle Union, talks about the feelings she went through as the NBA legend had to undergo surgery



Gabrielle Union Breaks Silence on Dwyane Wade‚Äôs Cancer Fight

Dwayne Wade has been married to his wife, famous Hollywood actress Gabrielle Union, for more than a decade, but it seems like the NBA legend faced difficulties in expressing his health battles even to his wife. Recently, Gabrielle Union appeared on an episode of Today with Jenna & Friends, where she spoke about the things she went through as her husband dealt with cancer.On the February episode of Today with Jenna & Friends, Dwayne Wade‚Äôs wife, Gabrielle Union, said, ‚ÄúThat level of vulnerability, to go through removal of a good chunk of his kidney and the healing that involved, he needed us to be OK with his vulnerability.‚ÄùShe added, ‚ÄúBut more than that, he needed to be OK with his vulnerability. It was a challenge to give grace and receive it.‚ÄùThe famous actress, Gabrielle Union, also spoke about the fears she had experienced when the NBA legend had to undergo surgery to remove a major part of his kidney.On the same episode of Today with Jenna & Friends, Gabrielle Union said, ‚ÄúObviously, him getting that diagnosis was traumatic for him, ‚Ä¶But you also don‚Äôt understand the journey and the toll it takes on your marriage, on your family, on your kids,‚ÄùGabrielle Union has also confessed that there were times when the actress thought the NBA legend was ‚Äúgone‚Äù despite being positive.The NBA legend Dwayne Wade underwent his kidney surgery back in December 2023 but kept things private until he was fully cured and ready to talk about it in public.Dwayne Wade first opened up about his cancer diagnosis on his podcast in January 2025. He has revealed that he went for a body checkup when doctors caught something unusual on one of his kidneys.It was then on the recommendation of a third doctor, that he removed a majority portion of one of his kidneys. When this portion was then tested, it was revealed that had Dwayne Wade not gone ahead with the surgery, he would be dealing with Stage 1 cancer.The NBA legend has now recovered completely and is spending all his time creating more awareness about the illness.Also Read: "Nepotism at its worst": LeBron James' praise for son Bronny James sparks backlash as fans accuse him of "forcing nepotism"
Article Summary: Dwayne wade‚Äôs wife, gabrielle union, talks about the feelings she went through as the nba legend had to undergo surgery to remove a major part of his kidney. The famous actress also confessed that there were times when the actress thought thenba legend was ‚Äúgone‚Äù despite being positive.

Article Title: Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift are ready to settle down together as the couple finds their new love nest
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Montana emerges as the perfect retreat for Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift

Kansas City Chiefs ‚Äô star tight end Travis Kelce and global pop icon Taylor Swift are taking steps toward their future together, with recent reports suggesting that Montana could be their ideal destination to settle down. While some speculated that Kelce might have retired had the Chiefs won the Super Bowl, it appears the couple is moving forward with their life plans regardless of his football career status.Kelce and Swift have reportedly fallen in love with Montana‚Äôs serene, media-free environment, making it an attractive option for their future home. A source speaking with RadarOnline.com revealed, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs their happy place. They could see themselves building a life there someday. It‚Äôs the one place they truly feel free.‚ÄùThis revelation follows reports that the couple was initially eyeing real estate in Kansas City. However, after a visit to the Auric Room at Lone Mountain Ranch, Montana has seemingly become their preferred choice for a peaceful and private retreat.While Kelce remains a key player for the Chiefs, speculation about his retirement has been ongoing. Some insiders believe that if Kansas City had secured the Super Bowl victory, Kelce might have stepped away from the game to focus on his personal life with Swift. However, since that didn‚Äôt happen, his football career will continue for at least another season.Despite that, Kelce and Swift are not waiting for his retirement to make future plans. They are actively considering Montana as the place where they will begin the next chapter of their relationship. The state‚Äôs peaceful ambiance and lack of constant media attention make it the perfect escape from the public eye.Kelce‚Äôs growing interests outside of football, such as podcasting and potential acting roles, make the possibility of his retirement even more intriguing. Swift, known for her meticulous planning, appears ready to take their relationship to the next level.Also Read: Travis Kelce's beau Taylor Swift makes history again as ‚ÄúAll Too Well (10 Minute Version)‚Äù breaks Spotify streaming record Although Kelce‚Äôs immediate future is still tied to the NFL , one thing is clear‚Äîthe couple is laying the foundation for a future together, and Montana might just be the place where they make that dream a reality.
Article Summary: Montana emerges as the perfect retreat for travis kelce and taylor swift. Some speculated that kelce might have retired had the chiefs won the super bowl. Since that didn‚Äôt happen, his football career will continue for at least another season.

Article Title: Brady Tkachuk, Tim Stutzle, and Ridly Greig struggle as the Ottawa Senators fall to the Pittsburgh Penguins
Article Text:
Image Via IG

Brady Tkachuk Falls short in a must-win game

Tim Stutzle‚Äôs offensive struggles continue

Ridley Greig‚Äôs costly penalty proves to be the turning point

The Senators of Ottawa endured a night of torment as a 1-0 scoreline was knocked down by the Pittsburgh Penguins . They had all scoring chances, and the contribution of Anton Forsberg was a stunning goaltending performance with 34 stops in net, but the Senators could not find a way to break through Tristan Jarry's 31 shots. Sidney Crosby's power-play goal early in the third period sealed Ottawa's fate. While for some players, there was contribution, for others, it was a denial of any impact, and that further hampered the disappointment of the loss the teamsuffered.As captain and the heart and soul of the team, if the team needed their leader to step up in a clutch moment, this was it. But he couldn't deliver. While Tkachuk threw some hits and had three shots on goal, his real contribution in the offensive department was minimal.Tkachuk is often a difference-maker, yet, in this case, he was unable to conjure the positive energy Ottawa so desperately needed. If the Senators fight for the playoff spot, Tkachuk has to step up and be a leader.When Tim Stutzle is on his game, Ottawa's offense looks threatening. Unfortunately, that was not the case against Pittsburgh. Stutzle played almost 19 minutes but did not have a single shot on goal. With the opponents exploiting Stutzle's lack of offensive involvement, the Penguins were in total control of the match.Stutzle is vital to the creative flow and scoring chance production of the Senators. If he keeps having silent nights like that one, things are only going to get worse in an already-struggling offensive environment.Out of all the mistakes Ottawa made, Ridly Greig's penalty near the end of the contest had to be the most damaging. With just seconds on the clock and Pittsburgh holding a 4-3 lead, Greig committed a hooking penalty against Sidney Crosby, giving Pittsburgh a power-play opportunity that lasted into overtime, where they did not waste any time scoring the winner.Greig's blunder illuminated the importance of discipline during the clutch moments of a contest. With four shots on goal, in the end, Greig's unwarranted penalty erased any positive contributions he might have made.As the playoff picture becomes clearer, the Ottawa Senators cannot afford to drop any more important games. Their next test is the Buffalo Sabres, a matchup that may have significant implications for their postseason chances.Stars such as Brady Tkachuk, Tim Stutzle, and Ridly Greig need to step up for the team to recover. The senators may still redeem themselves, but they are running out of time.
Article Summary: Pittsburgh penguins defeated the ottawa senators 4-3 in a must-win game. Sidney crosby's power-play goal early in the third period sealed ottawa's fate. Brady tkachuk, tim stutzle, and ridly greig need to step up for the team.

Article Title: Andrew Krakouer death cause: AFL legend's untimely death at 42 leaves fans shocked
Article Text:
Credit: X

Andrew Krakouer's life is full of talent, redemption, and legacy



Life beyond Football: A mentor and advocate



Andrew Krakouer passed awy leaving a lasting legacy



The Australian football community is mourning the tragic loss of former AFL star Andrew Krakouer , who passed away at the age of 42 due to a suspected heart attack at his family home in Perth. Krakouer, remembered as a "trailblazer" and "just a ripper person," left behind a legacy that transcended his achievements on the field. From a promising career in the AFL to overcoming personal challenges and making an impact off the field, his story is one of resilience, redemption, and inspiration.Born into a family deeply rooted in Australian Rules Football, Andrew Krakouer was the son of Jim Krakouer and nephew of Phil Krakouer‚Äîtwo legendary figures who mesmerized North Melbourne fans with their skill and flair in the 1980s. Following in their footsteps, Andrew made his mark in the AFL after being drafted by Richmond in 2000 with the 41st selection.Krakouer played 102 games for the Tigers between 2001 and 2007, contributing 102 goals and establishing himself as a dynamic forward. His ability to read the game and position himself perfectly made him one of the most dangerous crumbing forwards of his time. Richmond legend Matthew Richardson paid tribute to his former teammate, describing him as "the best crumbing forward I played with ... the perfect crumber, and he was a good mark for his size as well. When he was on song, he was unbeatable."Despite his undeniable talent, Krakouer‚Äôs journey took a difficult turn when he was delisted by Richmond in 2007 following a legal issue. He was sentenced to four years in prison for intent to cause grievous bodily harm, a setback that threatened to derail his career. However, it was during this period that Krakouer began his journey of redemption.While serving his sentence, Krakouer played football for the prison team, using the sport as a means of personal transformation. Upon his release on parole in 2009, he returned to the WAFL with Swan Districts, determined to reclaim his place in the game he loved.Krakouer‚Äôs redemption story reached its peak in 2010 when he delivered a stunning performance in the WAFL Grand Final. He won the Simpson Medal for best on ground, playing a key role in Swan Districts‚Äô thrilling one-point victory over Claremont. His performance that season also earned him the prestigious Sandover Medal, further cementing his remarkable comeback.Former Swan Districts coach Brian Dawson reflected on Krakouer‚Äôs journey, stating, "He owned his sentence with good grace and worked very hard to rehabilitate himself." His resilience and determination caught the attention of AFL clubs, and in 2011, Collingwood gave him a second chance at the elite level.Krakouer‚Äôs return to the AFL with Collingwood was nothing short of inspirational. He played 35 games for the Magpies between 2011 and 2013, kicking 50 goals. One of his most memorable performances came in the 2011 Grand Final, where he kicked three goals in a losing effort against Geelong.That same year, he took home the Mark of the Year award for a spectacular grab against Adelaide, further showcasing his football prowess. Despite struggling with injuries and inconsistency in the following seasons, his impact at Collingwood remained undeniable. Former coach Nathan Buckley acknowledged his contributions, saying, "Gee he went through a bit in his life, Krak, he probably had the worst of it and the best of it, he showed real grit to fight back and do what he did in his career."After leaving the AFL in 2013, Krakouer continued to contribute to the game in different ways. He had a short stint in the WAFL with West Perth before transitioning into mentoring and media roles. He became a well-respected broadcaster, co-hosting Yokayi Footy and appearing as a commentator on Fox Footy.His contributions extended beyond football, as he became a voice for Indigenous players and communities. Richmond Football Club CEO Shane Dunne recognized his influence, stating, "His contributions to the game were matched by the strength of his character and resilience. He was a trailblazer and fittingly wore our colors for the first AFL Dreamtime at the ‚ÄòG match in 2005. He was very proud of his culture and someone that young Indigenous players looked up to."Krakouer‚Äôs ability to turn his life around and give back to the community made him an inspiration for many. He shared his experiences with school and community groups, hoping to guide young players and individuals facing adversity.Andrew Krakouer is survived by his partner, Barbara Garlett, and their four daughters. His sudden passing has left the football world in mourning, with tributes pouring in from teammates, coaches, and fans.AFL CEO Andrew Dillon expressed his sorrow, stating, "To lose him at such an early age is a tragedy, and we hope there can be some peace for his family in this heart-breaking and difficult time."Also Read: Dogfighting case: Nearly 200 dogs seized from ex-NFL RB LeShon Johnson, the largest federal seizure from one individual His former teammate Matthew Richardson also reflected on Krakouer‚Äôs warmth and character, saying, "He always greeted you with a hug and a warm smile. He had a great sense of humor and was one of those people you felt really good to be around... just a ripper person."Andrew Krakouer will be remembered not just for his remarkable football skills but also for his impact on the lives of those around him. His legacy as a player, mentor, and advocate for Indigenous communities will continue to inspire generations to come.
Article Summary: Former afl star andrew krakouer passed away at the age of 42 due to a suspected heart attack at his family home in perth. He was remembered as a "trailblazer" and "just a ripper person," leaving behind a legacy that transcended his achievements on the field. Andrew krakouer has passed away at the age of 33.

Article Title: "That smile means the world to me": Growing up fatherless, Derrick Rose explains why he gives his all to be the dad he never had
Article Text:
Image via Griffin Quinn/ Getty Images

Derrick Rose‚Äôs journey: From overcoming childhood struggles to becoming a devoted father

Derrick Rose opens up about fatherhood and breaking the cycle



Derrick Rose dazzled fans for years with his explosive speed and gravity-defying plays. But his most meaningful role has nothing to do with basketball‚Äîit‚Äôs about being a father. Growing up in Chicago‚Äôs Englewood neighborhood without a father figure, Rose faced obstacles that could have derailed his dreams. Instead, he turned that absence into motivation, vowing to be the kind of dad he never had.From the moment he picked up a basketball, Derrick Rose was on a mission to become something greater than his circumstances. But his drive wasn‚Äôt just about making it to the NBA . "My dad wasn‚Äôt around at all. I took it as motivation where it‚Äôs like I‚Äômma smash everything that he even wanted to dream about," Rose once revealed. For years, he held onto the belief that his father might be out there, watching his rise to stardom. The painful truth eventually surfaced‚Äîhis father, Walker, had passed away long ago.That revelation didn‚Äôt slow him down. Instead, it fueled his legendary work ethic, pushing him to become the youngest MVP in NBA history. But as time went on, his priorities shifted. The game that once defined him took a backseat to something far more important‚Äîhis family.As the 2024-25 NBA season approached, Rose made a decision that surprised many: he was stepping away from the game to dedicate himself fully to his children. "I‚Äôve been thinking about it for a while, and I feel like I need to fully dedicate myself to my son now," he shared. His five-year-old son, London, initially struggled with the news. "He was very sad," Rose admitted. But as they embraced this new chapter, father and son grew even closer. "From that moment on, it has been all love."Rose‚Äôs commitment to fatherhood was on full display on March 29, 2025, when he was given the honor of throwing the ceremonial first pitch at the Chicago White Sox ‚Äôs opening game against the LA Angels . But this wasn‚Äôt just about baseball‚Äîit was a family affair. With London gripping his hand, Rose stepped onto the mound at Guaranteed Rate Field, the crowd cheering as he delivered the pitch. His wife, Alaina Anderson, and their seven-year-old daughter, Layla, beamed from the stands, capturing the moment on their phones. It was a full-circle experience for the Chicago native‚Äîthis time, not as an NBA star, but as a father making memories with his children.During the post-game press conference, London sat comfortably in his father‚Äôs arms as Rose reflected on the moment. Later, he shared a touching Instagram post: "That smile means the WORLD to me. Me not having my dad around makes me go ALL in with my kids. I wish I would‚Äôve met my dad. We would‚Äôve laughed about how I crush everything he did as a MAN lol."Rose isn‚Äôt just present in his children‚Äôs lives‚Äîhe‚Äôs leading by example. Speaking on the Club 520 Podcast, he explained what fatherhood means to him. "My kids call me dad; I love when they call me dad. Not ‚Äòfather‚Äô‚Äîthat doesn‚Äôt sound right to me," he said. "It‚Äôs about the time that I‚Äôm putting in, giving every one of my kids that equal time."His eldest son, PJ Rose, has begun carving out his own basketball journey, but Rose makes it clear that there‚Äôs no pressure. "You‚Äôre your own person; you are PJ Rose; you are your own entity," he tells him, emphasizing that his son doesn‚Äôt have to live in his shadow.Discipline and structure are just as important to Rose as encouragement. "I have to be a little bit more strict on [PJ] as far as making sure he gets up on time for school, taking out the garbage‚Äîall little chore stuff. But it creates your character, you know what I‚Äôm saying?"Also Read: ‚Äú Can‚Äôt ask for a better birthday weekend‚Äù: Ayesha Curry shares her heartfelt reaction to yacht party and Stephen Curry‚Äôs touching tribute Derrick Rose‚Äôs basketball legacy is set in stone, but his most meaningful accomplishment has nothing to do with stats or accolades. It‚Äôs about breaking the cycle of absence and making sure his kids never experience the loneliness he once did. From a childhood without a father to becoming a hands-on dad, Rose has rewritten his own story. His time in the NBA may be over, but in the game of life, he‚Äôs still delivering clutch performances‚Äîthis time, as a father first.
Article Summary: Derrick rose is the youngest mvp in nba history. He is stepping away from the game to dedicate himself fully to his children. His five-year-old son, london, initially struggled with the news. But as they embraced this new chapter, father and son grew even closer. Derrick rose's most meaningful accomplishment has nothing to do with stats or accolades.

Article Title: ‚ÄúHe would have been a huge star of bare-knuckle boxing‚Äù: Joe Rogan pays respect while commending deceased UFC veteran‚Äôs striking skills
Article Text:
Joe Rogan. Photo via Christian Petersen/Getty Images

Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship

deceased fighter

Joe Rogan commends Kevin Ferguson for his transition from street fighter to professional MMA fighter

Joe Rogan Experience #2296 - Big Jay Oakerson

Despite a short-lived career in MMA, Kevin Ferguson , aka Kimbo Slice , was known for his violent striking style. In fact, this is the very reason that Joe Rogan believed the former UFC veteran would have been a good fit for a promotion like, a promotion that runs on the idea of no gloves and all fists. In a recent podcast of the Joe Rogan Experience, the commentator praised thefor his courageous step into the Octagon when he was in his late 30s. Ferguson died in 2016, succumbing to chest congestion.Bahamian-born American MMA fighter and professional boxer Kevin Ferguson was primarily a bare-knuckle boxer, whose videos of the mutual combat street fight were very popular. His popularity even earned him the title of The King of the Web Brawlers by the American magazine Rolling Stone. Before being signed by the UFC, Ferguson was associated with promotions like Elite XC and was part of the TV series The Ultimate Fighter , created by Dana White. His official heavyweight debut at UFC 113 was his last match at the UFC after he lost the bout to Matt Mitrione in the second round. After UFC, the fighter tried to sign with the promotion Strikeforce, but the negotiations failed owing to a disputed pay structure. Even though the fighter had announced his retirement from MMA and had decided to venture into professional boxing, an announcement by Bellator MMA in 2015 marked the return of Ferguson into the world of MMA.Ferguson was one of the few fighters who showed that a backyard street fighter from Miami could do what most people deemed impossible. The determination and strong will of Ferguson are much appreciated and applauded today. On the Joe Rogan Experience, the American podcaster praised the fighter for his striking style and the courage he showed by entering the world of MMA at an unconventional age.‚ÄúIf he was fighting just stand-up only, he‚Äôs very dangerous. Like if he was involved in like if bareknuckle boxing was around back then he would have been a huge star of bareknuckle boxing. He would have f***** a lot of people up bareknuckle boxing.‚Äù Rogan further added, ‚ÄúKimbo had a bunch of injuries from football. You can‚Äôt really grapple at full capacity with knee injuries and learn grappling at 35 or however old he was‚Ä¶But dude kudos to that guy for having the courage to actually get into the UFC and The Ultimate Fighter.‚ÄùAlso read: Khabib Nurmagomedov‚Äôs retirement: Chael Sonnen reveals the real reason he left MMA The Bare-Knuckle Fighting Championship was founded in 2018, two years after the fighter passed away. With a promotion like BKFC, Ferguson might have had better results and off-the-charts MMA stats.
Article Summary: Joe rogan commends kevin ferguson for his transition from street fighter to professional mma fighter. In a recent podcast of the joe rogan experience, the commentator praised thefor his courageous step into the octagon when he was in his late 30s. The bare-knuckle fighting championship was founded in 2018, two years after the fighter passed away.

Article Title: Who is Ashwani Kumar? MI's debutant pacer who took a wicket on first ball vs KKR
Article Text:
Ashwani Kumar (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Wicket on the first ball on IPL debut for MI

Ali Murtaza vs RR, 2010 (Naman Ojha)

Alzarri Joseph vs SRH, 2019 (David Warner)

Dewald Brevis vs RCB, 2022 (Virat Kohli)

Ashwani Kumar vs KKR, 2025 (Ajinkya Rahane)*

NEW DELHI: Mumbai Indians' left-arm pacer Ashwani Kumar had a dream debut in the IPL, striking with his very first delivery against Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) on Monday at the Wankhede Stadium.The 23-year-old dismissed KKR skipper Ajinkya Rahane in the fourth over, becoming the fourth MI bowler to claim a wicket with his first ball in the tournament.Ali Murtaza, Alzarri Joseph and Dewald Brevis had achieved the feat for MI before Ashwini.Ashwini's breakthrough came courtesy of a stunning catch by Tilak Varma, who initially fumbled but recovered quickly to complete a one-handed grab at deep backward point.Hailing from a town called Jhanjeri, near Chandigarh, Ashwani has previously represented Punjab in first-class, List A, and T20 cricket. He has played just four senior T20 matches before his IPL debut ‚Äî alongside two Ranji Trophy and four List A appearances ‚Äî Ashwani stunned the cricketing world with a four-wicket haul.Ashwini returned figures of 4 for 24 in 3 overs, making him the first Indian ever to claim four wickets on IPL debut.This was the first time in his career that Ashwani picked up four wickets in a single match. His previous best figures were 3/37 in List A cricket and 1/19 in T20s.Ashwani‚Äôs dream debut has added a new dimension to Mumbai Indians‚Äô bowling attack, and his performance will surely make him a key player to watch in the ongoing season.After being sent in to bat by MI skipper Hardik Pandya, KKR were bowled out for 116 in 16.2 overs, with Ashwani‚Äôs strikes setting the tone for MI‚Äôs dominance.
Article Summary: Ashwani kumar took four wickets on his ipl debut for mumbai indians. The 23-year-old struck with his very first delivery against kolkata knight riders. He is the fourth mi bowler to claim a wicket with his first ball in the tournament.

Article Title: Riyan Parag takes selfie with ground staff, then tosses phone away after RR beat CSK - WATCH
Article Text:
Image credit: IPL

Poll Should players interact more with ground staff after matches? No, they should focus on the game Yes, it's important for team spirit

Bombay Sport Exchange Episode 1: Interview with Sanjog Gupta, CEO (Sports) at JioStar

NEW DELHI: After two consecutive defeats, Rajasthan Royals finally got their IPL 2025 campaign back on track with a hard-fought six-run victory over Chennai Super Kings at the Barsapara Cricket Stadium in Guwahati on Sunday. Stand-in skipper Riyan Parag , who led the team in the absence of the injured Sanju Samson, breathed a sigh of relief as RR secured their first win of the season.However, Riyan found himself at the center of controversy following his post-match gesture in Guwahati.After the match, ground staff members eagerly approached him for a selfie with their local hero. Riyan stopped, acknowledged their request, and took a photo with them. But what followed left many stunned.After clicking the selfie, he threw the mobile phone back to one of the staff members instead of handing it over.The act did not sit well with fans on social media, who criticized Riyan for his rudeness, calling the gesture disrespectful and unnecessary.Riyan has also been fined Rs 12 lakh for maintaining a slow over-rate during Rajasthan Royals' six-run victory over Chennai Super Kings."As this was his team's first offence of the season under Article 2.22 of the IPL's Code of Conduct, which pertains to minimum over-rate offences, Parag was fined Rs 12 lakh," IPL stated in an official release.After losing their season opener to Sunrisers Hyderabad, Rajasthan Royals will next take on Punjab Kings in Mullanpur on April 5.
Article Summary: Riyan parag fined rs 12 lakh for slow over-rate during rajasthan royals' six-run victory over chennai super kings. After the match, ground staff members eagerly approached him for a selfie with their local hero. But after clicking the selfie, he threw the mobile phone back to one of the staff members.

Article Title: 'He doesn't have to spoon-feed me': Varun Chakaravarthy on his on-field understanding with Sunil Narine
Article Text:
Sunil Narine and Varun Chakaravarthy (AFP Photo)

Poll Do you think Varun Chakaravarthy and Sunil Narine make a great team? Not Really Somewhat Absolutely

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

IPL 2025: How will KKR, MI, CSK, SRH, RCB fare this season?

KKR in IPL 2025: Kolkata Knight Riders seek successful title defence

Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) spinner Varun Chakaravarthy has credited his long-time bowling partner Sunil Narine for shaping his career, emphasising their strong on-field understanding."Now that I've played five years alongside him ‚Äî this is my sixth year ‚Äî we don't need to communicate as much anymore. He doesn't have to spoon-feed me. Whatever I can learn, I just observe what he is doing," Chakaravarthy said on JioHotstar's Gen Bold.Acknowledging Narine's stature in T20 cricket, he added, "We have always bowled well in tandem, and he has been the most valuable player in T20 cricket from the very beginning. Even this year, he will be the MVP."Discussing his approach in high-pressure situations, Chakaravarthy emphasised keeping things simple. "Don't try to bowl a magic ball or create a magic moment. The most impactful thing you can do is stick to your basics, do them well, and execute them properly," he explained.As a key bowler for KKR, he acknowledged the weight of expectations. "Expectations have always been there from the first game I played, and it's the same for every cricketer in the IPL. You just need to focus on your process and not think too far ahead."Chakaravarthy is keen to dismiss India captain Rohit Sharma and star batter Virat Kohli in IPL 2025 . "Definitely any batsman who is in great form. Players like Heinrich Klaasen, Nicholas Pooran, Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma, and Suryakumar Yadav‚Äîthese guys are all star players. I would be very happy if I could pick their wickets," he said.Chakaravarthy, fresh from a stellar run in India's Champions Trophy triumph in Dubai, remains focused on continuous improvement. "You can have a great previous tournament, but again you have to start from scratch. That's what cricket teaches you. I'm preparing for that ‚Äî starting from zero," he concluded.
Article Summary: Varun chakaravarthy credits sunil narine for shaping his career. Kolkata knight riders (kkr) spinner is keen to dismiss india captain rohit sharma and star batter virat kohli in ipl 2025. "definitely any batsman who is in great form. I would be very happy if i could pick their wickets"

Article Title: Sanju Samson travels to CoE to seek clearance to keep wickets in IPL 2025
Article Text:
Sanju Samson (Image credit: BCCI/IPL)

Poll How important is Sanju Samson's role as a wicketkeeper for his team in IPL? Not important at all Somewhat important Very important



Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

IPL | Punjab Kings' Suryansh Shedge: From playing under Shreyas to dreaming of meeting Kohli

MUMBAI: India's T20 wicketkeeper-batter and opener Sanju Samson has gone to the Board of Control for Cricket in India's ( BCCI ) Centre of Excellence (CoE) in Bengaluru to seek clearance for keeping wickets and fielding.The Rajasthan Royals regular captain, who had a fractured right index finger that required surgery, flew from Guwahati to Bengaluru on Monday to seek full clearance from the CoE's medical team.Samson had initially received only a partial clearance to play in the first three matches of the IPL 2025 , where he was allowed to bat, but not field or keep wickets. Consequently, the Rajasthan Royals opted to play him as mostly an Impact Player, giving the captaincy to allrounder Riyan Parag.If granted permission to keep wickets, Sanju will also return as skipper. Since the Rajasthan Royals' next match is now only on April 5 at Mullanpur, Samson has enough time to return to the wicketkeeping duties, provided he clears a few "final fitness tests" as a source put it.Samson has made scores of 66 (vs SRH), 13 (vs KKR), and 20 (vs CSK) in the three games he has played so far purely as a batter as an Impact Player. In his absence, Dhruv Jurel kept wickets for the team.The Royals have had a mixed start to their IPL campaign, losing their first two games before opening their account with a win against Chennai Super Kings in Guwahati on Sunday night.
Article Summary: Sanju samson has gone to the board of control for cricket in india's ( bcci ) centre of excellence (coe) in bengaluru to seek clearance for keeping wickets and fielding. The rajasthan royals regular captain, who had a fractured right index finger that required surgery, flew from guwahati to bengaluru on monday to seek full clearance from the coe's medical team.

Article Title: 'Itinerary would offer ...': Pat Cummins reveals an 'ideal' Australian vacation for Virat Kohli
Article Text:
Pat Cummins and Virat Kohli (Pic credit: X)

Poll Would you want to join Virat Kohli on his ideal vacation? No, I prefer my own plans. Maybe, depends on the location. Absolutely!

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

IPL | Punjab Kings' Suryansh Shedge: From playing under Shreyas to dreaming of meeting Kohli

Australian cricket captain Pat Cummins, currently in India for the Indian Premier League (IPL), has expressed his deep connection with the country, calling it his "second home.""I've been lucky to spend lots of time there [India] over the last 15 years playing for Australia and in the Indian Premier League, most recently as captain of the Sunrisers Hyderabad ," Cummins stated. "India has such a rich culture from the vibrant markets to historic temples, and of course the amazing food. The energy in places like Mumbai and Delhi is infectious."Freshly appointed as an advocate for the Australian Tourism Board , Cummins is excited to promote his homeland. "I'm proud to be part of Tourism Australia 's Friends of Australia program and their latest campaign, Howzat for a Holiday, which aims to showcase Australia to India," he said.Cummins revealed what an ideal Australian vacation for Indian cricket star Virat Kohli would look like. "This itinerary would offer a blend of cricket, adventure, culture and relaxation, with experiences in some of Australia's most iconic locations."Addressing the pressures of being in the public eye, Cummins acknowledged media scrutiny but remained unfazed. "The media, especially in a cricket-loving nation like Australia, can be unforgiving. I don't let negativity distract me and appreciate the importance of keeping things in perspective, good or bad."
Article Summary: Australian cricket captain pat cummins is currently in india for the indian premier league (ipl) cummins has expressed his deep connection with the country, calling it his "second home" cummins revealed what an ideal australian vacation for indian cricket star virat kohli would look like.
